member.name: T:Cyotek.Drawing.BitmapFont.BitmapFont
member.summary: A bitmap font.

member.name: F:Cyotek.Drawing.BitmapFont.BitmapFont.NoMaxWidth
member.summary: When used with , specifies that no wrapping should occur.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Drawing.BitmapFont.BitmapFont.AlphaChannel
member.summary: Gets or sets the alpha channel.
member.value: The alpha channel.
member.remarks: Set to 0 if the channel holds the glyph data, 1 if it holds the outline, 2 if it holds the glyph and the outline, 3 if its set to zero, and 4 if its set to one.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Drawing.BitmapFont.BitmapFont.BaseHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of pixels from the absolute top of the line to the base of the characters.
member.value: The number of pixels from the absolute top of the line to the base of the characters.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Drawing.BitmapFont.BitmapFont.BlueChannel
member.summary: Gets or sets the blue channel.
member.value: The blue channel.
member.remarks: Set to 0 if the channel holds the glyph data, 1 if it holds the outline, 2 if it holds the glyph and the outline, 3 if its set to zero, and 4 if its set to one.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Drawing.BitmapFont.BitmapFont.Bold
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the font is bold.
member.value: true if the font is bold, otherwise false.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Drawing.BitmapFont.BitmapFont.Characters
member.summary: Gets or sets the characters that comprise the font.
member.value: The characters that comprise the font.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Drawing.BitmapFont.BitmapFont.Charset

member.value: The green channel.
member.remarks: Set to 0 if the channel holds the glyph data, 1 if it holds the outline, 2 if it holds the glyph and the outline, 3 if its set to zero, and 4 if its set to one.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Drawing.BitmapFont.BitmapFont.Italic
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the font is italic.
member.value: true if the font is italic, otherwise false.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Drawing.BitmapFont.BitmapFont.Packed
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the monochrome characters have been packed into each of the texture channels.
member.value: true if the characters are packed, otherwise false.
member.remarks: When packed, the property describes what is stored in each channel.

member.summary: Gets or sets the padding for each character.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Drawing.BitmapFont.BitmapFont.Smoothed
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the font is smoothed.
member.value: true if the font is smoothed, otherwise false.

member.summary: Gets or sets the level of super sampling used by the font.
member.value: The super sampling level of the font.
member.remarks: A value of 1 indicates no super sampling is in use.

member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the texture images used by the font.
